results.headline: Samsung Union Steps Up Pressure Over Pay With Three-day Strike
results.summary: Thousands of Samsung Electronics Co. workers walked off the job Monday to stage a rally demanding better pay, beginning the biggest organized labor action in the South Korean conglomerate’s half-century history.

results.headline: Thousands of Samsung Workers Walk Out in Historic Strike
results.summary: More than 6,500 Samsung Electronics Co. workers walked off the job on Monday to stage a rally demanding better pay, beginning the biggest organized labor action in the South Korean conglomerate’s half-century history. The three-day strike comes after negotiations over compensation and vacation time collapsed last month.
